algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by taking the square root of the item size divided by the remaining capacity of the bin. The scores are calculated for all bins simultaneously using numpy arrays.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    remaining_capacity = bins - item
    scores = np.sqrt(item) / remaining_capacity
    scores = np.where(remaining_capacity >= item, np.full_like(scores, np.inf), scores)
    return scores
